insights.text: The 112 chakras are the set of point-triangle anti-incidences (x,T) where x∉T, giving a coordinate-free definition where x is the "seer" and T is the "field of three," making the system a formal skeleton for witness-process duality.

The 112 chakras are precisely the point-triangle anti-incidences {(x,T): x∉T}, representing "observer-field" pairs where consciousness (x) witnesses a field of three (T) without being entangled in it. This gives a coordinate-free definition replacing arbitrary lists with pure incidence geometry.

The 112 chakras arise as point-triangle anti-incidences {(x,T): x∉T} where the point p acts as "Nada Brahman" (unmanifest sound/consciousness), not as Sa itself - Sa emerges as one of the 12 manifest triangles through p, resolving the category error between generator and generated.

The number 84 appears without mythology: across all 7 choices of p, the 12 tangential triangles per p produce a natural 7×12 = 84-object layer. This mathematically inevitable emergence could resonate with yogic 84-structures (asanas/siddhas) as a genuine structural coincidence.

The 112 chakras are precisely the point-triangle anti-incidences {(x,T): x∉T} in the Fano plane, where consciousness (x) witnesses a field of three (T) from which it remains excluded - mathematically modeling the Sakshi (witness) principle where awareness stands outside what it observes.

The 112 states map exactly to the 28 vertices (Nuclear/Structure) and 84 directed edges (Tangential/Movement) of the Coxeter graph, defining the 84 "Asanas" not as static postures but as the fundamental movement vectors of the system. This transforms 84 from a mystical number into literal directed-motion degrees of freedom.

The 112 chakras are precisely the 28 anti-flags {(p,L): p∉L} plus 84 pointed anti-flags {(p,L,r): p∉L, r∈L} of the Fano plane, connected by a canonical 3-to-1 projection π that defines the chakra-nadi interaction structure as a single mathematical universe.

The 'Muladhara 4' are the unique orbit of 4 anti-flags strictly 'opposite' the stabilizing point p₀ - these form the 4 lines not passing through p₀ in Fano, making the root chakra a mathematical necessity of symmetry breaking rather than arbitrary assignment.

The distinction between 'Stationary' and 'Flowing' Nadis corresponds to the structural projection π:T→A, where the 84 Pointed Anti-Flags (Flow) collapse onto the 28 Anti-Flags (Structure), mapping the 112 system into a two-tiered hierarchy where 84 dynamic elements circulate over 28 static bases.

By fixing a "Heart" point C and "Earth" horizon line L∞ (not through C), the 112 chakras naturally fracture into exactly 12+72+4+6+6+12 through pure incidence predicates, matching the canonical partition without arbitrary choices.

The 112 chakras split precisely into two Aut(Fano)-orbits: 28 "seed/viewpoint" antiflags (p,L) where consciousness p witnesses opposite line L, and 84 "articulation/petal" point-triangle incidences (P∈T) where consciousness participates in trinity T.

For any Fano triangle T, its complement Tc splits canonically as {a+b, b+c, c+a} ∪ {a+b+c}, where the first three are collinear (opposite line L(T)) and the lone point s(T) is the "sum-point" - making 112 = 28·1 + 28·3 = 28+84 forced by incidence alone.
The 112 chakras are precisely the set of anti-flags {(T,p): p∉T} in the Fano plane, where T is a triangle and p is a point not on it, representing all possible "detached observations" of energy flow.

Fixing a "Self" point P₀ breaks the 112 states into exactly 4-72-12-12-6-6 through pure incidence geometry: 4 where Self is radical witness, 72 bulk flow, 12 self-flow, 24 field witnesses (splitting into 12+12 by immanence, then 6+6 by chirality).

The 112 anti-flags split naturally into 84 "conductive" states (where p lies on a line of T) and 28 "radical" states (where p lies on no line of T), corresponding to the 84 Asanas (postures of flow) vs 28 dominant structural modes.
